analyzed: / myong ba mngon sum gyis grub la /
translated: It is true that experience is established by direct perception,

original: tshad mas grub la gnod pa gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni bden no //
analyzed: tshad mas grub la gnod pa gzhan med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni bden no //
translated: and that it is established by valid cognition and is not contradicted by anything else.

original: rnam pa ni gzugs can la brtag pa byas pa dang / mtshungs pas dpyad na ma grub la /
analyzed: rnam pa ni gzugs can la brtag pa byas pa dang / mtshungs pas dpyad na ma grub la /
translated: But the aspect is not established when it is analyzed, because it is similar to the analysis of physical form,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu la yang sgrub byed med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu la yang sgrub byed med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and there is no proof of cause and effect.

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: That is not correct.

original: rnam pa nyams su myong phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa nyams su myong phyir ro //
translated: Because the aspect is experienced.

original: rgyu 'bras don du med na myong ba yang med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras don du med na myong ba yang med par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If cause and effect are not established as different things, it follows that experience does not exist.

original: myong ba mngon sum du grub pas med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: myong ba mngon sum du grub pas med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Experience is not nonexistent, because it is established by direct perception.

original: 'o na rgyu 'bras kyang mngon sum du grub pas yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na rgyu 'bras kyang mngon sum du grub pas yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Well, then, since cause and effect are also established by direct perception, they exist.

original: rgyu 'bras dus gsum du skye ba mi 'thad pas med do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras dus gsum du skye ba mi 'thad pas med do zhe na /
translated: Since the arising of cause and effect in the three times is untenable, they do not exist.

original: myong ba yang dus gsum du myong ba med pas 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: myong ba yang dus gsum du myong ba med pas 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Since experience is also not experienced in the three times, it is tenable.

original: dus gsum med pas myong ba med par mi 'gyur te khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dus gsum med pas myong ba med par mi 'gyur te khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Since the three times do not exist, experience does not exist. Since the pervasion is not established, that is not so.

original: 'o na dus gsum ma grub pas skye ba med ces bya ba yang khyab pa ma grub po //
analyzed: 'o na dus gsum ma grub pas skye ba med ces bya ba yang khyab pa ma grub po //
translated: Well, since the three times are not established, arising does not exist. Since the pervasion is not established, that is not so.

original: skye ba'i mtshan nyid snga ma la ltos pa la brjod la snga phyi'i dus ma grub pa la mi 'grub pas khyab pa grub po zhe na /
analyzed: skye ba'i mtshan nyid snga ma la ltos pa la brjod la snga phyi'i dus ma grub pa la mi 'grub pas khyab pa grub po zhe na /
translated: The characteristic of arising is said to depend on the prior. Since it is not established in the prior and posterior, the pervasion is established.

original: myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni bems po las log pa yin la /
analyzed: myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni bems po las log pa yin la /
translated: The characteristic of experience is the opposite of matter.

original: de yang snga phyi'i dngos po yin pas de snga phyi'i ma grub par mi 'grub pas khyab pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang snga phyi'i dngos po yin pas de snga phyi'i ma grub par mi 'grub pas khyab pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Since that is also a prior and posterior entity, since it is not established in the prior and posterior, the pervasion is established.

original: med pa ma yin yang the tshom za'o zhe na /
analyzed: med pa ma yin yang the tshom za'o zhe na /
translated: Even though it is not nonexistent, there is doubt.

original: de ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de ni mi 'thad de /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: nges dang ma nges gnyis med pa //
analyzed: nges dang ma nges gnyis med pa //
translated: And it is impossible for both certainty and uncertainty

original: dngos po gcig la mi srid do //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la mi srid do //
translated: To occur in a single entity.

original: dngos po snang ba la sogs pa las yang na nges pa yin la yang na ma nges pa las myong ba gzhan mi srid pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po snang ba la sogs pa las yang na nges pa yin la yang na ma nges pa las myong ba gzhan mi srid pa'o //
translated: It is impossible for there to be another experience, either certain or uncertain, apart from the appearance of the entity.

original: gzhan yang myong ba mngon sum rgyu 'bras dmigs na bden par 'grub la /
analyzed: gzhan yang myong ba mngon sum rgyu 'bras dmigs na bden par 'grub la /
translated: Moreover, if the cause and effect of the experience of the object are perceived, then the object is established as truly existent.

original: ma dmigs pa snang du rung na /
analyzed: ma dmigs pa snang du rung na /
translated: If the cause and effect are not perceived, then the object is not perceived.

original: 'o na mthar thug gi myong ba la gtad nas dris pas na snang du rung ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na mthar thug gi myong ba la gtad nas dris pas na snang du rung ba mi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: But if you say that the object is not perceived because it is directed toward the ultimate experience, then the object is not perceived because it is suitable to appear.

original: rgyu 'bras khas mi len no zhes zer ba 'gal ba 'du ba khas len pa 'thad dam zhes spyod cig /
analyzed: rgyu 'bras khas mi len no zhes zer ba 'gal ba 'du ba khas len pa 'thad dam zhes spyod cig /
translated: If you say that you do not accept cause and effect, then you should be asked whether it is correct to accept a contradiction.

original: de ltar ma yin na tha snyad du bum pa phyogs na snang du ma dmigs pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na tha snyad du bum pa phyogs na snang du ma dmigs pa yin /
translated: If you do not accept this, then you would have to say that conventionally a pot is not perceived when it appears in a certain place,

original: med pa ni ma yin zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med pa ni ma yin zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: but it is not nonexistent.

original: rgyu 'bras khas len pa yang mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir dang rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang / rgyu med pa las mi skye phyir //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras khas len pa yang mi rigs par bstan pa'i phyir dang rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka dang / rgyu med pa las mi skye phyir //
translated: Because it does not arise from self, other, both, or causelessly.

original: rang ma grub na rgyu yang med la /
analyzed: rang ma grub na rgyu yang med la /
translated: If it does not exist in itself, it does not have a cause.

original: grub na skyes zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub na skyes zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it exists, it has already arisen.

original: gzhan la yang rtag pa dang mi rtag pas @309b dpyad na skye ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gzhan la yang rtag pa dang mi rtag pas @309b dpyad na skye ba mi 'thad do //
translated: If it is analyzed in terms of other and permanent and impermanent, arising is untenable.

original: gnyis pa las ni 'gal ba 'du ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa las ni 'gal ba 'du ba'o //
translated: From the second, the collection of contradictions.

original: rgyu med pa ni yod pa dang med pa zhes rtag tu bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa ni yod pa dang med pa zhes rtag tu bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From the third, the existence and nonexistence of a cause would be permanent.

original: gal te phyogs gzhan mi 'thad kyang rgyu yod pa gzhan mi rtag pa par mchod pa las 'bras bu skye'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs gzhan mi 'thad kyang rgyu yod pa gzhan mi rtag pa par mchod pa las 'bras bu skye'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that although the other positions are untenable, an effect arises from the existence of another impermanent cause,

original: phyogs thams cad kyis mchod na dus mnyam par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyogs thams cad kyis mchod na dus mnyam par 'gyur te /
translated: if it is offered to all positions, it would be simultaneous.

original: ba lang gi rva g-yas pa dang g-yon pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ba lang gi rva g-yas pa dang g-yon pa bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the right and left horns of an ox.

original: gal te rang dus kyis bar mchod pa'i phyir zer ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub la /
analyzed: gal te rang dus kyis bar mchod pa'i phyir zer ba ni gtan tshigs ma grub la /
translated: If you say that it is offered to its own time, the reason is not established.

original: gzhan dus kyis bar ma chod zer na khyab pa ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan dus kyis bar ma chod zer na khyab pa ma grub po zhe na /
translated: If you say that the other is not obstructed by time, then the pervasion is not established.

original: 'o na ni dbus na gnas pa'i rdul yul mtha' dag gis bar ma chod pa'i phyir yul gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la yang mtshungs te rang yul gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni dbus na gnas pa'i rdul yul mtha' dag gis bar ma chod pa'i phyir yul gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la yang mtshungs te rang yul gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you say that the middle particle is one place because it is not obstructed by other particles, then the same would apply to the statement that the middle particle that remains in the middle is one place because it is not obstructed by all the other places.

original: gtan tshigs ma grub la //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma grub la //
translated: The reason is not established.

original: gzhan gyi yul gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir zhe na khyab pa grub po //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yul gyis bar ma chod pa'i phyir zhe na khyab pa grub po //
translated: If you say that it is because it is not obstructed by other places, then the pervasion is established.

original: gal te sbyar bya gcig las med na sbyor byed lhag ma rnams kyang dus gcig par 'gyur la /
analyzed: gal te sbyar bya gcig las med na sbyor byed lhag ma rnams kyang dus gcig par 'gyur la /
translated: If there is no more than one object of conjunction, then the remaining conjoiners would be simultaneous.

original: sbyor byed yul tha dad na sbyor bya dbus kyi rdul kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor byed yul tha dad na sbyor bya dbus kyi rdul kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the conjoiners are different places, then the middle particle that is the object of conjunction would also be different.

original: 'o na sbyar bya dus gcig las med na sbyor byed dus lhag ma rnams dus gcig par 'gyur la sbyor byed dus tha dad na sbyar bya dbus kyi dus tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na sbyar bya dus gcig las med na sbyor byed dus lhag ma rnams dus gcig par 'gyur la sbyor byed dus tha dad na sbyar bya dbus kyi dus tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: If there is no more than one time of the object of conjunction, then the remaining times of the conjoiners would be the same time. If the times of the conjoiners are different, then the middle time of the object of conjunction would be different.

original: rgyu ma 'gags pa'i dus su 'bras bu med la /
analyzed: rgyu ma 'gags pa'i dus su 'bras bu med la /
translated: At the time when the cause has not ceased, the effect does not exist.

original: 'bras bu skyes pa'i dus su rgyu 'gags pas /
analyzed: 'bras bu skyes pa'i dus su rgyu 'gags pas /
translated: At the time when the effect has arisen, the cause has ceased.

original: phyogs gcig dang mtha' dag gi brtag pa mi 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: phyogs gcig dang mtha' dag gi brtag pa mi 'jug go zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the analysis of the one part and the whole does not apply.

original: 'o na dbus rdul gyi yul la med pa dang gcig ce na /
analyzed: 'o na dbus rdul gyi yul la med pa dang gcig ce na /
translated: Well, is it not the case that the middle particle is not an object?

original: 'o na rdzas mkhan gyi khyim gyi bum pa phyogs 'dir med ces bkag pas kyang rdza mkhan gyi bum pa dgag byar thal lo //
analyzed: 'o na rdzas mkhan gyi khyim gyi bum pa phyogs 'dir med ces bkag pas kyang rdza mkhan gyi bum pa dgag byar thal lo //
translated: Well, then, it follows that the pot in the potter‚Äôs house is an object of negation, because it is negated as not being in this place.

original: gal te phyogs 'di na bum pa med pa dang / rdza mkhan gyi bum pa yod pa mi 'gal bas de dgag bya ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phyogs 'di na bum pa med pa dang / rdza mkhan gyi bum pa yod pa mi 'gal bas de dgag bya ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the nonexistence of the pot in this place and the existence of the potter‚Äôs pot are not contradictory, and therefore they are not objects of negation,

original: de bzhin du rig pa'i ngo bo na snang ba med pa dang / tha snyad pa'i ngo bo la snang ba mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin du rig pa'i ngo bo na snang ba med pa dang / tha snyad pa'i ngo bo la snang ba mi 'gal lo //
translated: then in the same way, the nonexistence of appearances in the essence of awareness and the existence of appearances in the conventional essence are not contradictory.

original: tha snyad pa'i snang ba rig pa'i ngo bor med pas bkag pas tha snyad pa'i snang ba bkag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad pa'i snang ba rig pa'i ngo bor med pas bkag pas tha snyad pa'i snang ba bkag pa ma yin no //
translated: Since conventional appearances do not exist in the essence of awareness, the negation of them is not the negation of conventional appearances.

original: 'o na gang rnam par gcod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na gang rnam par gcod ce na /
translated: Well, then, what is it that is eliminated?

original: rig ngor tha snyad shes mi gnas //
analyzed: rig ngor tha snyad shes mi gnas //
translated: Conventional cognition does not abide in the essence of awareness.

original: yod na de ni dgag bya yin //
analyzed: yod na de ni dgag bya yin //
translated: If it did, it would be an object of negation.

original: yod do zhe na rig ngo na //
analyzed: yod do zhe na rig ngo na //
translated: If you say that it does exist, then

original: gnas pa dgag bya yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa dgag bya yin no //
translated: it is the abiding itself that is to be refuted in the face of awareness.

original: de med pas dgag tu med kyi /
analyzed: de med pas dgag tu med kyi /
translated: Since that does not exist, there is nothing to be refuted.

original: mi mkhas pa'i rig pa'i don gnas par zhen pas de'i yul bzlog go //
analyzed: mi mkhas pa'i rig pa'i don gnas par zhen pas de'i yul bzlog go //
translated: However, the object of the fixation on the abiding of the object of awareness of the unwise is refuted.

original: de rgyal ba byams pas /üîΩ'di la dgag pa ci yang med //
analyzed: de rgyal ba byams pas / 'di la dgag pa ci yang med //
translated: The Victor Maitreya explains:üîΩThere is nothing at all to be refuted here,

original: bsnan par bya ba ci zhig med //
analyzed: bsnan par bya ba ci zhig med //
translated: and nothing at all to be added.

original: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
analyzed: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
translated: See reality as it is.

original: yang dag mthong bas rnam par grol //üîΩzhes bshad do //
analyzed: yang dag mthong bas rnam par grol // zhes bshad do //
translated: Seeing reality, you will be liberated.

original: de ltar rnam grol ba'am don dam par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar rnam grol ba'am don dam par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, it is liberation, or ultimate reality,

original: rigs pas grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rigs pas grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is established by reasoning.

original: @310a * // ma yin te /
analyzed: @310a * // ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: rigs pas grub pa'i rnam bcad tsam ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pas grub pa'i rnam bcad tsam ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere elimination established by reasoning is not established.

original: 'o na ci zhig tsam /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhig tsam /
translated: Well then, what is established?

original: dngos po bkag pa du zad kyi //
analyzed: dngos po bkag pa du zad kyi //
translated: The mere elimination of entities,

original: bkag pa ci zhig khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bkag pa ci zhig khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because no negation is accepted.

original: bkag pa ma grub na dngos po rnam par gcad pa mi 'thad do zhe na /
analyzed: bkag pa ma grub na dngos po rnam par gcad pa mi 'thad do zhe na /
translated: If the negation is not established, the elimination of entities is not tenable.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,üîΩbecause the negation is established by the nonestablishment of the object of negation.

original: 'gags pa rig pa'i don yod pas dngos po rnams rnam par bcad pa la ma khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gags pa rig pa'i don yod pas dngos po rnams rnam par bcad pa la ma khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of awareness that is the negation is not necessarily a negation of an entity.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: dngos po la gnas pa'i tshad ma thengs pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: dngos po la gnas pa'i tshad ma thengs pa tsam du zad do //
translated: It is merely the exhaustion of the valid knowledge that is based on the entity.

original: gnod pa'i tshad ma ni khyab byed mi dmigs pas khyab bya bkag pa tsam du zad kyi grub pa la mi ltos so //
analyzed: gnod pa'i tshad ma ni khyab byed mi dmigs pas khyab bya bkag pa tsam du zad kyi grub pa la mi ltos so //
translated: The valid knowledge that is the refutation is merely the negation of the pervaded due to the non-observation of the pervader, and it does not rely on an affirmation.

original: rnam par gcad pa la gzhi dngos por gyur pa la mi ltos pas ni sngon gyi slob dpon gyis gtan la phab zin to //
analyzed: rnam par gcad pa la gzhi dngos por gyur pa la mi ltos pas ni sngon gyi slob dpon gyis gtan la phab zin to //
translated: The earlier masters have already determined that the basis of the negation does not rely on an entity.

original: 'o na rig pa'i shes pa la chos can snang ngam mi snang zhe na des ci zhig bya /
analyzed: 'o na rig pa'i shes pa la chos can snang ngam mi snang zhe na des ci zhig bya /
translated: Well, does the subject appear to the awareness that is the negation or not? What is the point?

original: snang na don dam par 'gyur la /
analyzed: snang na don dam par 'gyur la /
translated: If it does appear, then it is ultimate.

original: mi snang na spros pa chod de /
analyzed: mi snang na spros pa chod de /
translated: If it does not appear, then conceptual elaborations are eliminated.

original: mig gi rnam shes kyis sgra la spros pa mi chod pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam shes kyis sgra la spros pa mi chod pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: It is just as the eye consciousness does not eliminate conceptual elaborations with respect to sound.

original: rig par 'gro ba'i sgo nas snang ste /
analyzed: rig par 'gro ba'i sgo nas snang ste /
translated: It appears from the perspective of the awareness that is the negation.

original: khyab byed du mi rtogs pa las khyab byar rtogs pa'i rig pa skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab byed du mi rtogs pa las khyab byar rtogs pa'i rig pa skye ba ma yin no //
translated: The cognition that realizes the pervaded does not arise from the cognition that does not realize the pervader.

original: de lta bu sngon du song ba med pas mig gi rnam shes kyis sgra la spros pa mi chod do //
analyzed: de lta bu sngon du song ba med pas mig gi rnam shes kyis sgra la spros pa mi chod do //
translated: Since that is not preceded by that, the eye consciousness does not eliminate proliferation regarding sound.üîΩHaving thus eliminated proliferation in that way, meditate without doubt.

original: de ltar de lta bus spros pa chod par the tshom med par byas la bsgom pa ni sems gnas pa'i man ngag blo la shes par byas la /
analyzed: de ltar de lta bus spros pa chod par the tshom med par byas la bsgom pa ni sems gnas pa'i man ngag blo la shes par byas la /
translated: The instruction for stabilizing the mind should be understood in the mind.

original: the tshom med par rig pas ngo bo rtogs pa dang / mi g-yeng mi 'bying ba zhi gnas kyi stobs kyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: the tshom med par rig pas ngo bo rtogs pa dang / mi g-yeng mi 'bying ba zhi gnas kyi stobs kyis 'byung ste /
translated: Realization of the essence and the arising of nondistraction and non-drowsiness occur through the power of ≈õamatha.

original: de ltar rtsol ba klong la mnyam par gzhag go //
analyzed: de ltar rtsol ba klong la mnyam par gzhag go //
translated: As such, rest evenly in the expanse of effort.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa na yul snang ngam mi snang zhe na /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa na yul snang ngam mi snang zhe na /
translated: If it is asked whether or not the field appears when resting evenly,

original: phyogs gcig dang mtha' dag gi brtag pa mi 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyogs gcig dang mtha' dag gi brtag pa mi 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: the investigation of one part or the whole does not apply.

original: gal te yul de med kyang spyir med pa ma yin pas rdul la yang ba rtag pa 'jug go //
analyzed: gal te yul de med kyang spyir med pa ma yin pas rdul la yang ba rtag pa 'jug go //
translated: If it is said that even though that field does not exist, since it does not exist in general, it is applied to the particle, lightness, and permanence.

original: 'o na dus der med kyang spyir med pa ma yin pas dus la yang brtag pa 'jug go //
analyzed: 'o na dus der med kyang spyir med pa ma yin pas dus la yang brtag pa 'jug go //
translated: But if it does not exist at that time, it is not nonexistent in general, and so the investigation of time is applicable.

original: gal te skad cig ma cha med pa la dus kyi cha'i brtag pa mi 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te skad cig ma cha med pa la dus kyi cha'i brtag pa mi 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that the investigation of time is not applicable to a partless instant,

original: 'o na rdul phra rab cha med pa la yul gyi cha'i brtag pa yang mi 'jug go //
analyzed: 'o na rdul phra rab cha med pa la yul gyi cha'i brtag pa yang mi 'jug go //
translated: then the investigation of space is not applicable to a partless atom.

original: gal te cha med na gzugs can nyams par 'gyur bas rdul la brtag pa 'jug go zhen /
analyzed: gal te cha med na gzugs can nyams par 'gyur bas rdul la brtag pa 'jug go zhen /
translated: If you say that the investigation of space is applicable to an atom because if it had no parts it would not be material,

original: skad cig ma la yang dus kyi cha med na dus nyams par 'gyur bas dus kyi mtha' skad cig ma la yang brtag pa 'jug pa kho na'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma la yang dus kyi cha med na dus nyams par 'gyur bas dus kyi mtha' skad cig ma la yang brtag pa 'jug pa kho na'o //
translated: then the investigation of time is applicable to an instant because if it had no parts it would not be time.

original: des na brtag pa 'jug pa la phyogs kyi chos grub pa yin no //
analyzed: des na brtag pa 'jug pa la phyogs kyi chos grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the property of the position is established in the application of the investigation.

original: gal te grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis su 'gyur bas brtag pa 'jug go zhe na /
analyzed: gal te grib ma dang nyi ma gnyis su 'gyur bas brtag pa 'jug go zhe na /
translated: If you say that the investigation is applicable because there would be two, shade and sunlight,

original: 'bab chu'i rgyun dang / sngon med pa dang / zhi gnas med pa la sogs pas bar ma chod kyang yul dus gcig pa med @310b pas khyab pa med pas khyab pa ma grub po zhe na /
analyzed: 'bab chu'i rgyun dang / sngon med pa dang / zhi gnas med pa la sogs pas bar ma chod kyang yul dus gcig pa med @310b pas khyab pa med pas khyab pa ma grub po zhe na /
translated: Even if there is no interruption by a stream of water, or by something that did not exist before, or by the absence of meditative serenity, there is no pervasion because there is no pervasion that a single place and time do not exist.

original: ma yin te don dam par 'dod na brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te don dam par 'dod na brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you assert that ultimately, the reason is not established because the two are similar in being imagined.
